bio: The Most Interesting Dad in The World.................... Stuntman, Tv Host, Pro Bmx Bike rider, Dad, Dude #BeTheAdventure

list.comment:
A 20 foot mural of me....in another life.
#betheadventure #tattoo #outdoors #laink
San Francisco mornings with @dupedupe -happy to be working with some old friends this next 2 days in the city! #betheadventure #sanfrancisco #skateboard #demo

I don’t have any footage really of me on mega ramp.we think this is 2007 @xgames mega ramp qualifying run. This was only the second year of Bmx on mega. In 2005 they let me set 2 world records on the jump then opened up mega to Bmx in 2006. Here’s a 360 table one handed and probably my biggest air on a quarter pipe haha .. I’m guessing it’s about 12 feet which doesn’t seem like much on mega cause dudes go over 20 now but - 12 feet above any vert ramp is something a small group of people share together - probably less the 100 people in the world have gone that high above a vert ramp bike and skate combined -less then 30 have gone as high as those guys go today. Stoked for the clip @Mavro thanks - also shout out to @krobbmx for the high five at the bottom. He knew I was stoked to get that high... even though he is in the 20+ zone. #betheadventure #bmx #megaramp #xgames #vert

Happy Birthday to my longtime friend @united_ian - we have literally traveled all over the world together for the past 25 years. Good times , bad times , broke times and more.. he has always been there... hope you had a wonderful day friend. Hope to see you soon . #betheadventure #hbd #pals #bmx
Sunset dips with my lady.... #lunaberlin - best part of my day. #betheadventure #outdoors #sunsets #dad #daughter #family

Happy birthday @ant_cam . The big 17 came fast. Almost all grown up. But to me you will always be this little kid who I loved going on adventures with. Hope you have a great day. #betheadventure #hbd #kids #growingup
My sweet little gumball machine... #lunaberlin #betheadventure #happyhalloween #dad #daughter

Pre jump convo @brandonlillard While enjoying the beautiful view just after taking off over #hunningtonbeach - it’s crazy how beautiful everything is as soon as you can see it from afar without the chatter of everyone’s thoughts and drama. This was such a wonderful day! @condorbmx is on the other side with @helijim at the Stick. @live_like_roner we love you. #betheadventure #helicopter #beach #california #skydive #gopro #gpathlete @gopro #goprofusion
Alaska in June...legit the best trip I’ve ever been on. Photo @davyj0nes #betheadventure #alaska #travel #outdoors #nature
Pumpkin patching with my mutant today... #bethadventure #halloween #dad #daughter @bubsnaturals

Stoked to see it coming to life After session 2. @nikkohurtado is killing this #LunaBerlin portrait. I can’t tell you how much fun it has been getting tattooed down at @blackanchorworldwide - last night was 6 hours of non stop laughs and stories...can’t wait to get this thing finished up. Thanks Nikko for making it more then I ever hoped for. #betheadventure #tattoo #ink #losangeles #daughter #dad
Foggy morning this morning in @losangeles_city - how does everyone start their day? What rituals do you have ? #betheadventure #la @gopro #gpathlete #gopro #hottub #ritual @270pro
Tango & Cash. #thankyou #lunaberlin #betheadventure #dad #daughter thanksgiving 2018
Sunday in the city. #betheadventure #lunaberlin @losangeles_city #losangeles #dad #daughter @gopro #gopro #gpathlete

Chargers vs Broncos football today with my good friend @pixopatomus it’s her first football game! It was my first Vegan pizza earlier - worlds collide! #betheadventure #football #churros #chargers #losangeles
Here we go! Round 2! With @nikkohurtado on my #LunaBerlin portrait! Always so fun to come hang at @blackanchorworldwide in Hollywood!

MISSION ACCOMPLISHED!! I’ve known @condorbmx 25 years and never did doubles with him. We planned this Texas trip with the thought we would go up to OKC to visit Mat. What we didn’t realize was he was in Sydney Australia until a day later then expected - so we rerouted to be in the area and by the time we got to his house we had driven 2400 miles - he has just got off a 17 hour flight and we have to leave by 2 pm to make it home on time - so we got the session started and got about 4 runs - 2 of which we got it done - just in time before our backs went out.. and we had to get back on the road.... stoked. Timing is everything.. #betheadventure #bmx #vert #pals photo by @jasonenns
Sometimes you gotta go at it alone.... #weatherthestorm #betheadventure #gopro #gpathlete @gopro @lifeproof #lifeproof #skydive #solo

What a trip..thanks @jasonenns for more memories from the road. We figure we’ve driven over 60 thousand miles on Bmx trips over the last 20 years together. Here’s to another 3825 more... thx for everyone we met or saw on the trip. Good to be home. #betheadventure #bmx #travel #roadtrip #pals #outdoors #toyota

For those of you who wanna see what it is like jumping out of the back of a plane here you go - this day was really clouding and we fought weather all day to get the shots we needed, we flew around at altitude waiting for a hole so we could spot our landing zone that happen to be a grass runway between two gator filled ponds in Florida. @travispastrana and @travisfienhage jumped about 12 seconds before me who were filming a commercial I was helping produce. But since we had a plane I figured I would enjoy it as well. You can see me constantly checking my wrist for my altitude, my head is on a swivel checking to see the guys below In case one of them happen to open earlier then expected. We jumped out at about 13000 and I pulled about 4500 giving me some extra time under canopy if i needed to make up some distance to make the landing zone. We were spot on, clouds made this jump epic. #betheadventure #skydive #gopro @gopro #gpathlete #fun #clouds

I took a lot of grief for a lot of years for being into so many different things when I was supposed to be just a professional bike rider. I’m so grateful I decided to be me through it all. It may not of been the easiest route but I promise you - you need you more then you need them. Be free. Be colorful. Be bold. Be loud. Be quite. Be curious. Be honest. Be kind. Be you. Be the Adventure. Be Thankful @lifeproof #lifeproof #lifeproofathlete #skydive #thanksgiving #color

Taping the ice on the over verted -I’ve spent a lot of time in El Paso but this is the first time we rode “The Hook” fun little session before we headed out yesterday. #betheadventure #gopro #gpathlete @gopro @united_bmx #bmx #abandoned

Demo day in #sanfrancisco this afternoon! Right in from of City Hall! 12 and 3:45 come down and say hi ! @tonyhawk @andymac720 @lizziearmanto @jimmy_wilkins @plronchetti @staabpirate1 @jordynbarratt #betheadventure #bmx #skate #vert #travel #outdoors
Hammock life with my ride or die #lunaberlin #sunset #betheadventure #dad #daughter #losangeles #gopro #gpathlete @gopro
Late night Southwest missions...#betheadventure #emptypools #abandoned #travel #outdoors #roadtrip photo @jasonenns

Hope everyone survives the week! - this is me at Camp Pendleton earlier this year, training and learning from the EOD crew just how dangerous what they do is and how their equipment works to help them. This Blast knocked me down a split second after this photo was shot. Respect to those guys and all of you out there serving our country. #betheadventure #military #eod #bomb #travel #service #boom photo @beansvisuals

We are launching our new bag!!! The 24seven over at @unchartedsupplyco - check the link in my bio for the early discounts and or my story for the video! #betheadventure #survival #seventy2 #unchartedsupplyco #backpack
Somethings never get old .... unlike me. Ice pick in steep and deep. Photo @jasonenns #lifeproof @lifeproof #betheadventure #emptypools #bmx #abandoned #allday
Monday. Anybody doing anything fun this week ? #betheadventure @uralmotorcycles #ural #motorcycle

Sky falling today! Had the pleasure of giving @kianamarquez her first fun jump after getting her A license. She crushed ! #betheadventure #skydiving #fun #outdoors #gopro #gpathlete @gopro @skydive_perris

Thanks for having me @tonyhawk - always fun getting to hang out with the crew and jibber jabber on the mic- till next time #sanfrancisco #betheadventure #skate #demo #outdoors #travel @gopro #gopro #gpathlete

SOUND ON! Today is #LunaBerlin 5th birthday! I couldn’t even fathom how my Dna was gonna change once she was here. She has changed me so much in the short 5 years. Seeing her strength in those first few months, her courage and curiosity in these last few years and her sweet kind heart the whole time. Thank you Luna for everything you’ve done for all of us ... Happy Birthday baby.. #betheadventure #hbd #dad #daughter #love #family

If this doesn’t prove the earths not flat I don’t know what else I can do - morning bomb drops with @travispastrana and @travisfienhage into deep woods ranch out here in Gatorland 🐊 #betheadventure #skydive #flatearth #gopro @gopro #goprofusion Florida

Everyone go wish @rickthorne a huge happy birthday! He’s 49 today and ripping harder then ever! I’ve known Rick for 24 years - since then we have been on multiple teams together, toured all over the planet, been in movies together and gone through so many changes in both our lives. I can truly say there is no one I’ve ever met with more passion towards what they are doing, between his bike riding, His band @goodguysinblack and his kids ... he spreads so much hard work and love into what he’s doing, I wish I had the same persistence he does... happy birthday old friend hope it’s a good one.. #betheadventure #bmx #hbd #shred #skatepark
Just before the sun went down last night in #Texas - snake running #betheadventure #fall #bmx #autumn #skatepark #gopro #gpathlete @gopro photo @jasonenns

Last fill up of the trip! And it’s Tradition to try and get as extreme as possible! This might be a record distance without drops spilled for @jasonenns and I! HAPPY THURSDAY! #betheadventure #travel #gas #outdoors #bmx #roadtrip #southwest

Here’s some BLACK FRIDAY DEALS - over at @unchartedsupplyco - the gift for the person who had everything accept a way to survive ! CODE: HOLIDAY75 - be safe ! #betheadventure #dontdie #unchartedsupplyco #travel #dad #daughter #family
College fjord, Alaska June 2018 photo @davyj0nes

I somehow missed my good friends birthday yesterday! So here’s a late Happy Birthday to @brian_terada -although we have been friends for about 20 years it wasn’t till the last few that we have become great friends - better late then never. There are days we go out to find pools and drive hundreds of miles and never actually take our bikes out of the car. And they are some of the best days ever... thanks Brian for always making it fun! Happy birthday man. #betheadventure #pals #hbd #bmx #emptypools #abandoned #gopro @gopro #gpathlete
Still playing in ditches - hope that never stops .. #tabletoptuesday from last weeks roadtrip with @jasonenns - photo Jason #bmx #travel #outdoors #explore
